statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT employee_id, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE review_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT feedback_id, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT feedback_id, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC, review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE employee_id = 200 AND review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT feedback_id, review_text FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY review_text ASC, review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_reviews > 3 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, date_created FROM feedbacks WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_id, reviewer_id FROM feedbacks WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT reviewer_id, employee_id, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE reviewer_id = 2 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY date_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, reviewer_id FROM feedbacks ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM feedbacks GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT feedback_text, reviewer_id FROM feedbacks WHERE reviewer_id = 200 AND feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT reviewer_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE reviewer_id = 456 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_name, department, remote FROM employees WHERE remote = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department, remote FROM employees WHERE remote = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedbacks WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND remote = FALSE;
SELECT employee_name, department, remote FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND remote = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_role FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_role = 'Manager';
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM employees WHERE employee_name LIKE 'John%' AND employee_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_role FROM reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT review_text FROM performance_reviews WHERE reviewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT DISTINCT position FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name DESC, hire_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, department, position FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Sales'

SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name, pr.rating FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.department_name JOIN PerformanceReview pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id WHERE pr.rating >= 4 ORDER BY pr.rating DESC
SELECT e.employee_name, f.feedback_text, f.feedback_date FROM Employee e JOIN Feedback f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id WHERE f.feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Department d LEFT JOIN Employee e ON d.department_id = e.department GROUP BY d.department_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC
